comments:
When I run the photran-3.1-beta1-full-win32 release, I get exceptions when I try edit a fortran file, or create a fortran project when using JRE version 1.4.2-b28 or version 1.4.2_12-b03. When I run using JRE 1.5.0_03-b07, I get no exceptions.  Exceptions:

java.version=1.4.2_12
java.vendor=Sun Microsystems Inc.
BootLoader constants: OS=win32, ARCH=x86, WS=win32, NL=en_US
Command-line arguments:  -os win32 -ws win32 -arch x86
